You are given two integers, $n$ and $k$ (where $1 \le k \le n \le 10^{12}$). 

A sequence of numbers is created as follows:

1. List all odd integers from 1 to $n$ in ascending order.
2. List all even integers from 1 to $n$ in ascending order.

What is the number that will be at the $k$th position in this sequence?

Given a number *n* and a position *k*, determine the number that will be at position *k* in a sequence of numbers generated by listing all odd numbers from 1 to *n* followed by all even numbers from 1 to *n*.
